text:
The guy was Paul Franklin, one of the original team members who started Dneg.

I wanted to watch the movie but I had to work. How was it otherwise? Did people ask a lot of questions? Was it a good experience overall ?

It was really good, I've seen it before but it was great to watch it with others and hear about the work that went into it.

A lot of people actually joined and they were answering some questions as they went a long.

It was quite fascinating hearing how it was pretty much done by only like 25 people with a really early version of Maya and when computers were still very early to. Really interesting as well that a lot of the creatures were hand modelled when you've got something like zbrush today lol. It was great experience overall.
Great. Iâ€™ll try watching the next one they organise.
